title: Google | L3 | India
content:
Education: B.Tech
Years of Experience: 1.9 years
Current CTC: ~30,00,000 INR
Date of the Offer: 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: Software Engineer - Level 3
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 23,00,000 INR
Signing Bonus: 2,00,000 INR
Stock bonus: ~11,00,000 INR stock grant first year (reduced in second year)
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 15% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~36,00,000 INR
Benefits: Standard Google Benefits

Is this a good offer? How much time it takes to get promoted to L4?

title: Guys Need help in deciding!
content:
Experience: SDE1
Previous Comp: 16.5(Fixed)
Company: Startup
Title/Level: SWE

Offer
role : SDE 2
company: Gaming Startup(Popular Appraisal ad on tv)
Base: 25LPA(fixed)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: None
Stock bonus: None
Bonus: None
Benefits: Standard PF, Insurance
location: Delhi
Routine: wfh 3 days wfo 2 days

Company: Bank which hired a lot of tech folks last year
Role: SDE1
Base: 22
Relocation: None
JB: 3LPA**
Variable: 2.2(10%)
WFO 5 days
location:Gurgaon

I have asked the Gaming Startup to increase the offer but they said its max they can give but HR said she'll talk to internal team if something can be done. (not inclined towards them as SDE2 getting that low will hurt my future negotiations)

Can you guys answer the following:
How much should be the pay difference to not join bank, I'm thinking if they give me 32 fixed or above I might join them as heard good things abt their work culture!

How is the work culture at the bank job ?

which one should I go for?

Current Location is NCR.
